CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {District Alpha}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {District Alpha}.

VE.Q: What is District Alpha's Life Expectancy in 2003?
VE.A: District Alpha's life expectancy in 2003 is {122.53} years.

VE.Q: What is District Alpha's Life Expectancy in 1995?
VE.A: District Alpha's life expectancy in 1995 is {101.07} years.

VE.Q: What is District Alpha's Life Expectancy in 1997?
VE.A: District Alpha's life expectancy in 1997 is {105.62} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Life Expectancy in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total life expectancy is {79.09} years.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Life Expectancy in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total life expectancy is {137.79} years.

SC.Q: What is the average height of District Alpha's Life Expectancy area?
SC.A: The average height of District Alpha's life expectancy area is {108.87} years.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Life Expectancy exceed 122 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {137.79} years in {2010}, total value was {122.45} years in {2004}, total value was {132.44} years in {2008}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Life Expectancy go below 97 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {96.55} years in {1993}, total value was {90.37} years in {1990}, total value was {86.64} years in {1988}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Life Expectancy fall between 104 and 115 years? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {105.62} years in {1997}, total value was {107.79} years in {1998}, total value was {111.48} years in {1999}.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1996, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 1989 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between {1987} and {1996} was {smaller} than between {1989} and {2006}.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2005, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 2001 and 2008?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between {2000} and {2005} was {smaller} than between {2001} and {2008}.

NC.Q: Was the total Life Expectancy in 1987 higher or lower than in 2002?
NC.A: The total life expectancy in {1987} was {lower} than in {2002}.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2008, was the average total Life Expectancy higher or lower than between 1999 and 2001?
NC.A: The average total life expectancy between {1998} and {2008} was {higher} than between {1999} and {2001}.
